Container.Name: Pulsarr
Container.Overview: Pulsarr is a real-time Plex watchlist monitoring, routing, and notification center that bridges Plex watchlists with Sonarr and Radarr. Features include smart content routing, approval workflows with quota management, Discord bot integration, multi-user support, and comprehensive analytics - all automated from within the Plex App itself.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port to access the web UI

Config.Name: Base URL
Config.Description: CRITICAL: Address where Sonarr/Radarr can reach Pulsarr for webhooks. Examples: http://pulsarr (Docker Compose), http://localhost (host networking), http://host.docker.internal (Docker Desktop), http://server-ip (separate machines)

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Internal application port (should match WebUI port)

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging level: fatal, error, warn, info, debug, trace, silent

Config.Name: Enable Console Output
Config.Description: Enable console logging output (set to 'false' to disable terminal output)

Config.Name: Enable Request Logging
Config.Description: Enable HTTP request logging with method, URL, response codes, and timing (sensitive parameters are redacted)

Config.Name: App Data Path
Config.Description: Path for configuration files, database, and logs
